resources.string: To start, select the navigation bar on the left and click on the Patient Info item. Use each device by clicking the corresponding option in the navigation drawer.
Enter in the corresponding patient information. Click send to send it to the doctor, or save to save the information in our records.
Plug the phone into the blood pressure moniter, and wait for the numbers to appear. You can then send the information.
Plug the phone into whichever device you want the picture from. Wait for it to appear on screen, and click send.
Click the navigation bar and the video conference will appear.
Plug the phone into the microscope and the view will appear. You can zoom in at any time, and stream this over video conference
